question: Frankly, web developer duties are:
answers: In a company, web-developers are just programmers who develop web applications. They don’t have to do with anything else.
Designing and programming web applications, from scratch.
Designing, programming, testing, and debugging web applications.
Developing appropriate code structures to solve specific tasks.
Coordinate with other people to develop web projects.
Coordinate with other designers and programmers to develop web projects.
Fix bugs.
Fix bugs, troubleshoot and resolve problems.
In a company, web-developers are programmers who deploy web applications. They don’t have to do with anything else.
In a company, web-developers are people who design, develop, test, and debug web applications. They don’t have to do with anything else.
In a company, web-developers are people who design, develop, test, and debug web applications. They might have other capabilities too. Who knows?!

question: What is HTML?
answers: HTML is the programming language of the web.
HTML is the programming language of the web. It is the dominant markup language for creating websites and anything that can be viewed in a web browser.
HTML stands for hyperText Markup Language. It is the dominant programming language for creating websites and anything that can be viewed in a web browser.
HTML is a markup language that web browsers use to interpret and compose text, images and other material into visual or audible web pages.

question: What is Node.js?
answers: Node.js is an open source, cross-platform runtime environment for server-side and networking applications.
Node.js is an open source database that focuses on ease of use and on being 'a database that completely embraces the web'.
Node.js is the programming language of the web.
Event-driven I/O server-side JavaScript environment based on V8.

question: What makes CouchDB different than other database management systems?
answers: It’s relaxing.
It has a built-in replication support (i.e. Master-Master Replication & Master-Slave Replication) with one master per slave, many slaves per master.
It’s sql queries are faster than other database management systems.
It’s a NoSQL database.
Retrieval of data is modeled in means other than the tabular relations used in relational databases.
Powerful mapping of data to allow querying, combining, and filtering the information.
Flexible document-based structure eliminates the need to worry about the structure of data, either before or during the application development.
It uses JSON to store data.
It uses Javascript as its query language.
It uses HTTP for an API.
